name: 柯開維
objective:
１.電腦網路概述與網路階層結構２.路由與交換技術與協定 ３.錯誤、流量與擁塞控制 ４.媒體存取控制 ５.區域網路技術與應用６.網際網路協定與標準７.網路互連技術８.網路機制效能評估
Objective
1. Establishing the basis of  communication systems, data
communication, and networking
2. Understanding the principle and operation of computer
networks,  and related protocols and equipments
schedule:
Part I: Class explanation
1. Introduction :
Data commu., network sturcture, topology, and
classification, protocols and standard
2. Network Models :
Layered commu and protocol stack, OSI 7-layer Internet protocol    stack
3. Data and Signals :
Signal, bandwidth, data rate, TX impairment, channel capacity, performance measure (delay and throughput)
4. Digital Transmission :
Digital-to-Digital: Line coding (NRZ/Biphase/AMI/ 8B6T …) and Block coding
5.  Analog Transmission :
Analog/Digital-to-Analog conversion (modulation)
6.  Transmission Media :
Guided (Twisted-pair/coaxial/fiber) and unguided (wireless)
7.  Bandwidth Utilization :
Multiplexing(TDM/FDM/ . . .)
8. Error Detection and Correction :
Parity, Hamming code, CRC, Checksum
9. Data Link Control :
framing (Synchronization), flow control,
protocol (HDLC or PPP)
10. Multiple Access :
Random access (ALOHA and CSMA series),   Controlled access (Reservation, plooing, token-based), Channelization (TDMA/FDMA/CDMA)
11. Wired LANs: Ethernet :
Ethernet family, design, equipment operations
12. Connecting  Networks :
Devices and their functionalities
13. Network Layer and Protocols :
Logical Addressing, Internet Protocol , Delivery,
Forwarding, and Routing
14. Transport-Layer and Protocols :
Process-to-Process Delivery: UDP  and TCP
15. Application Layer and Protocols :
     DNS, URL, Electronic Mail, File Transfer, and
       WWW and HTTP
